modmenu.descriptionTranslation.${mod_id}: Client-Side Fabric mod which gradually hides closest players (and other entities) to you.
${mod_id}.modmenu.title: §l${mod_name} Configuration
${mod_id}.modmenu.no_config_library_scre:
You need to install §6§lYet Another Config Lib [YACL]§f to open ${mod_name} Configuration Screen

§a§lOpen §6§lYACL §a§lModrinth page?
${mod_id}.modmenu.category.general.name: §lGeneral
${mod_id}.modmenu.group.main.name: §lMain
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.mod_enabled.des: If enabled, nearest entities will be translucent; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.group.hiding.name: §lHiding
${mod_id}.modmenu.group.hiding.descripti: Settings that control the power of entities translucent.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.hiding_activati:
The distance by X and Z at which the entity will start to become translucent.

The closer entity is to you, the more transparent he will be!
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.full_hiding_dis: The distance by X and Z axis at which the entity will be completely translucent.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.hiding_activati:
The distance by Y axis at which the entity will start to become translucent.

The closer entity is to you, the more transparent he will be!
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.full_hiding_dis: The distance by Y axis at which the entity will be completely translucent.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.min_hiding_valu: The minimum transparency value of the entity.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.hide_shadow_ena: If enabled, entity's shadows will be translucent too; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.hide_head_when_: If enabled, mod will hide player's heads if they are wearing something on it; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.category.entities.name: §lEntities
${mod_id}.modmenu.label.entities.info: Here you can find the options to enable transparency of other entities.
${mod_id}.modmenu.label.entities.info.be: §l§6Remember! This feature currently in beta testing!
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.hide_entity.des: If enabled, %s will be translucent; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.keybinding.name: ${mod_name}
${mod_id}.keybinding.toggle_mod.name: Toggle Mod
&6%s&f &aadded&f to favorite list and will be no longer hidden.
${mod_id}.command.favorite_entities.remo: &6%s&f &cremoved&f from favorite list and will be hidden.
Failed to find &6%s&f in favorite list!
${mod_id}.gui.favorite_button.tooltip: Adds the player to the favorite list. Favorite players and other entities will not be hidden by ${mod_name} mod.
